text: The Montfort Academy was founded in 1998 by Richard Greco Jr.The Montfort Academy It is a Catholic high school in Mount Vernon, New York. For the years 2005-2009, and 2012-2013, The Montfort Academy was named one of the best 50 Catholic high schools in America by the Cardinal Newman Society. == References == Category:High schools in New York (state) Category:1998 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in New York (state)
